decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The work to which this consent relates shall be begun not later than three years from the date of this consent. 
Reason: To comply with the requirements of Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 and the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015.
Condition : 2 - The works of demolition/alteration hereby authorised shall be carried out in complete accordance with the following plans and specifications:
[454/P/01, 454/P/10 rev A, 454/P/11 rev A, 454/P/12 rev A, 454/P/13 rev A, 454/P/20 rev D, 454/P/21 rev C, 454/P/22 rev A, 454/P/23 rev C, 454/P/24 rev C, 454/P/25 rev B, 454/31/10 rev C02, 454/31/12 rev C03, 454/01/27 rev C03, 454/21/03 rev C01, 454/21/04 rev C02, 454/01/23 rev C03, 454/P/50, 454/P/52, Heating and Ventilation Strategy Report dated 21/03/2023, Structural Report dated 28/03/2023, Tree Survey and Arboricultural Impact Assessment dated 29/08/2023, Fire Safety Strategy dated 23/02/2023]
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan.
Condition : 3 - Details and samples of new brickwork to be used for the replacement extension, boundary treatment and buttresses, hereby approved, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to their use. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved materials and thereafter so retained. 
Reason: In order to assess the suitability of the proposed materials, in the interests of the special architectural and historic interest of the property and the locality, in accordance with Wandsworth Local Plan policy LP3 (2023) coupled with the requirements of the National Planning Policy Framework 2023.  
Condition : 4 - Prior to any works to the roof, details and samples of replacement roof tiles (where the existing tiles cannot be reused), shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to their use. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved materials and thereafter so retained. 
Reason: In order to assess the suitability of the proposed materials, in the interests of the special architectural and historic interest of  the property and the locality, in accordance with Council policy and LP3 of the Wandsworth Local Plan 2023 coupled with the requirements of the National Planning Policy Framework 2023.  

Condition : 5 - The glazed window to the mezzanine meeting room shall comprise clear and transparent glazing.  
Reason: To ensure a high quality of development and to preserve the special architectural and historic interest of the property in accordance with policyLP3 of the 2023 Local Plan coupled with the requirements of the 2023 National Planning Policy Framework. 
Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding submitted information, prior to specific works taking place on site, detailed drawings of all new and replacement doors including architraves shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details. 
Reason: To safeguard the special architectural and historic interest of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Wandsworth Local Plan 2023.

Condition : 7 - Notwithstanding submitted information, prior to specific works taking place on site, a detailed schedule of repairs for the interior and exterior of the building shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details. 
Reason: To provide an accurate updated specification that has taken amendments to the proposal into account in order to safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Wandsworth Local Plan 2023
Condition : 8 - Notwithstanding submitted information, prior to specific works taking place on site, a detailed method statement shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority for the demolition works and enlarging of the buttresses and digging out of the floor. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details. 
Reason: To provide an accurate updated specification that has taken amendments to the proposal into account in order to safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Wandsworth Local Plan 2023.
description: Alterations including removal of single-storey lean-to. Erection of replacement single-storey extension, installation of replacement new and replacement doors, windows and rainwater goods and new interior fit out to provide office accommodation. (Associated plannign application 2023/0662)
